title: The Wild Bunch
content:
Hyperlite Mountain Gear are suckers for adventures that go beyond simply getting from Point A to Point B. The brand’s longtime friend Brett Davis thinks the same way, and along with his wife Diana, and co-conspirators, Steve “DOOM” Fassbinder and Jon Bailey, he proposed a daring plan and a 1,300-mile biking, hiking, and packrafting route through Utah and Wyoming following the escape trails of some of the most well-known outlaws in American history. Joining this group was filmmaker Greg Cairns and the adventure unfolds in this thrilling video!

author: John Watson
